title: Fragment of Ushabti
description:
Fragment (shoulders to knees) of green faience ushabti of Ptahnufer, the son of T3-nfr born to the lady Nht-mwt-rw. Inscription incised around lower part of body. Cf. 08.480.10 & 11 and 37.180E. Material is glassy faience.

Condition: Fragmentary. Glaze worn. Good workmanship. The material appears to be stone but is apparently a vitreous substance probably a very fine faience. Material is glassy faience.
credit_line: Gift of Evangeline Wilbour Blashfield, Theodora Wilbour, and Victor Wilbour honoring the wishes of their mother, Charlotte Beebe Wilbour, as a memorial to their father, Charles Edwin Wilbour

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
